description:
http://anidb.net/ch45815 [Kindaichi Hajime], the supposed grandson of the famous private detective Kindaichi Kosuke.
One day, Hajime and his girlfriend http://anidb.net/ch45816 [Miyuki] visit Hong Kong for a fashion event, where Miyuki is mistaken for someone else and kidnapped. Trying to save Miyuki will lead to an altogether different criminal case...
Source: ytv

REGULAR.description:
When a model who looks like Miyuki goes missing, Miyuki is recruited to take her place at a fashion show event in Hong Kong. Hajime and Miyuki go to Hong Kong, where they run into their friend, Saki... and Miyuki is abducted!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hong Kong Kowloon Zaihou Satsujin Jiken File. 1
L`affaire des meurtres du trésor de Kowloon à Hong Kong - Dossier 1
The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case, File 1
香港九龍財宝殺人事件 File.1

REGULAR.description:
While surprising information about the parentage of several of the people involved is revealed, Ran is kidnapped for real and the true nature of the Poison Dragon comes to light. Ran`s tattoo indicates the whereabouts of a nuclear bomb that could detonate in less than 12 hours!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hong Kong Kowloon Zaihou Satsujin Jiken File. 2
L`affaire des meurtres du trésor de Kowloon à Hong Kong - Dossier 2
The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case, File 2
香港九龍財宝殺人事件 File.2

REGULAR.description:
While Detective Li races to find the bomb before it goes off, Kindaichi goes back to the hotel to recreate the first murder. But how can one killer account for three murders when all of the main suspects have perfect alibis?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hong Kong Kowloon Zaihou Satsujin Jiken File. 3
L`affaire des meurtres du trésor de Kowloon à Hong Kong - Dossier 3
The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case, File 3
香港九龍財宝殺人事件 File.3

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi unmasks the true Poison Dragon! Did Miyuki really murder three people in Hong Kong?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hong Kong Kowloon Zaihou Satsujin Jiken File. 4
L`affaire des meurtres du trésor de Kowloon à Hong Kong - Dossier 4
The Hong Kong Kowloon Treasure Murder Case, File 4
香港九龍財宝殺人事件 File.4

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi is on a party boat with idol Hayami Reika and a lot of her other fans. He would be having a great time, too, if it weren`t for the suspicious man next to him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hayami Reika and the Uninvited Guest
Hayami Reika to Manekarezaru Kyaku
Reika Hayami et l`invité indésirable
速水玲香と招かれざる客

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi is on a treasure-hunting reality show with the goal to find a hidden ton of gold bullion, but he and the other contestants and staff don`t realize they`re being stalked by a murderous masked figure who may be an alchemist! Making matters worse is the fact that they`re trapped on an isolated island with no means of communication!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`affaire des meurtres autour de l`alchimie ! Dossier 1
Renkinjutsu Satsujin Jiken File. 1
The Alchemy Murder Case, File 1
錬金術殺人事件 File.1

REGULAR.description:
The bodies start piling up in the mansion on a solitary island. And when one member is murdered inside of a locked room, the only possible suspect is Reika-chan?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`affaire des meurtres autour de l`alchimie ! Dossier 2
Renkinjutsu Satsujin Jiken File. 2
The Alchemy Murder Case, File 2
錬金術殺人事件 File.2

REGULAR.description:
The Alchemist has already committed four murders, but Kindaichi is determined that there be no more. He also wants to prove Reika-chan`s innocence, since her fellow entertainers have seen fit to tie her up in the meantime. Can Kindaichi solve the twin mysteries of the locked room murder and the vanished sword?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`affaire des meurtres autour de l`alchimie ! Dossier 3
Renkinjutsu Satsujin Jiken File. 3
The Alchemy Murder Case, File 3
錬金術殺人事件 File.3

REGULAR.description:
Hajime uncovers the Alchemist`s final trick, and then exposes the killer`s identity! But what is the person`s motive for brutally murdering four people in a mansion on a remote island? The answer lies within a tale of tragedy and revenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`affaire des meurtres autour de l`alchimie ! Dossier 4
Renkinjutsu Satsujin Jiken File. 4
The Alchemy Murder Case, File 4
錬金術殺人事件 File.4

REGULAR.description:
When Hajime is in danger of having to repeat a year, Miyuki takes him to the hellishly strict Gokumon Prep School. But even before they can get a tour, a former student is murdered there via poison. Kindaichi is on the case, but it looks to become much bigger with a study retreat taking place in a secluded area and the machinations of the Puppeteer from Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokumonjuku Satsujin Jiken File. 1
L`affaire des meurtres à Gokumon ! Dossier 1
The Prison Prep School Murder Case, File 1
獄門塾殺人事件 File.1

REGULAR.description:
The Gokumon Prep School study retreat begins and the conditions are even harsher than Kindaichi was expecting! Not only that, he and Miyuki are put in a separate group, although they both hear hints of a group of six students who did something unforgivable in the past and now fear deadly retribution. Whose strings are the Puppeteer from Hell pulling and what is he going to make them do?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokumonjuku Satsujin Jiken File. 2
L`affaire des meurtres à Gokumon ! Dossier 2
The Prison Prep School Murder Case, File 2
獄門塾殺人事件 File.2

REGULAR.description:
Chaos ensues when the bodies of four missing students are discovered murdered and positioned in grisly ways patterned after class topics. Kindaichi and Inspector Akechi collaborate by phone from their separate murder sites, but are stumped when everyone has an alibi. Will the Puppeteer from Hell have the last laugh?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokumonjuku Satsujin Jiken File. 3
L`affaire des meurtres à Gokumon ! Dossier 3
The Prison Prep School Murder Case, File 3
獄門塾殺人事件 File.3

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi discovers the secret that punctures everyone`s supposedly airtight alibi! He assembles both groups, explains the reasoning behind the theme murders, and calls out the identity of Sparrow, the serial murderer of six students! Except as it turns out, Sparrow is actually...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokumonjuku Satsujin Jiken File. 4
L`affaire des meurtres à Gokumon ! Dossier 4
The Prison Prep School Murder Case, File 4
獄門塾殺人事件 File.4

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi reveals the identity of the second murdering Sparrow! But how did the Puppeteer from Hell convince two law-abiding people to commit serial murder? And what fate lies in store for all three criminals?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokumonjuku Satsujin Jiken File. 5
L`affaire des meurtres à Gokumon ! Dossier 5
The Prison Prep School Murder Case, File 5
獄門塾殺人事件 File.5

REGULAR.description:
Hajime, Miyuki, Inspector Kenmochi, and Superintendent Akechi are on JAM flight 377, despite the terrorist threat received right before takeoff. They`re getting closer to home when smoke suddenly fills the plane from the rear and the passengers panic, thinking it`s terrorism. But things aren`t what they appear as Hajime and Akechi soon find themselves trying to solve a locked-room murder case 10,000 meters in the air!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koudo Ichiman Meter no Satsujin File. 1
Meurtre à 10 000 mètres d`altitude Dossier 1
Murder at 10,000 Meters, File 1
高度一万メートルの殺人 File.1

REGULAR.description:
Hajime and Akechi team up to expose Captain Shida`s killer... or is that killers?! Whatever the case, it leads to a situation where the plane itself (including the hundreds of passengers inside) is put in a perilous position and only one person has a shot of saving them all... but it`s not Hajime!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koudo Ichiman Meter no Satsujin File. 2
Meurtre à 10 000 mètres d`altitude Dossier 2
Murder at 10,000 Meters, File 2
高度一万メートルの殺人 File.2

REGULAR.description:
One of Kindaichi`s earliest cases is a delicate situation as the 14-year-old Hajime is on the trail of Miyuki`s missing panties (and watch) from a campground. Complicating matters is the fact that Hajime himself is one of only three suspects, all of whom seem to have an ironclad alibi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Camp-jou no "Kai" Jiken
La "mystérieuse" affaire du camping
The Campground "Ghost" Case
キャンプ場の"怪"事件

REGULAR.description:
In the summer of their third year in middle school, Miyuki drags Hajime to swimming school so he can finally learn, but they stumble upon drama between two divers and former best friends competing for a place at a prestigious high school. An accident happens, putting the wealthy, privileged diver into a coma. Was it down to the rumored "evil spirit of the diving pool"? Hajime suspects a more down-to-earth evil and investigates!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Evil Spirit of the Diving Pool
L`esprit maléfique du bassin de plongeoir
Tobikomi Pool no Akurei
飛込プールの悪霊

REGULAR.description:
Three years ago, a girl died after being kidnapped and abused. The three minors who were responsible are back on the street, but when one of them is shot, Inspector Kenmochi disappears. Has old man Kenmochi turned vigilante?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inspector Kenmochi, Murderer, File 1
Kenmochi Keibu no Satsujin File. 1
Le meurtre de l`inspecteur Kenmochi - Dossier 1
剣持警部の殺人 File.1

REGULAR.description:
More evidence backs the unpopular idea that the missing Inspector Kenmochi is targeting the former minors out of revenge for what they did to the teenaged Marina three years ago. Although Hajime is convinced his old friend would never resort to vigilantism, Superintendent Akechi puts out an APB on Kenmochi on suspicion of murder!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inspector Kenmochi, Murderer, File 2
Kenmochi Keibu no Satsujin File. 2
Le meurtre de l`inspecteur Kenmochi - Dossier 2
剣持警部の殺人 File.2

REGULAR.description:
The Executioner strikes again, this time kidnapping Busujima! Can Hajime and Akechi track them down before it`s too late? Plus, more evidence points to Inspector Kenmochi being the murderous vigilante!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inspector Kenmochi, Murderer, File 3
Kenmochi Keibu no Satsujin File. 3
Le meurtre de l`inspecteur Kenmochi - Dossier 3
剣持警部の殺人 File.3

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi reveals the identity of the real Executioner at last! But what prompted his acts of bloody vengeance? Plus, a guest appearance by Hajime`s nemesis!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inspector Kenmochi, Murderer, File 4
Kenmochi Keibu no Satsujin File. 4
Le meurtre de l`inspecteur Kenmochi - Dossier 4
剣持警部の殺人 File.4

REGULAR.description:
On the bus ride home from an amusement park, Hajime and Miyuki are knocked out with a sleeping gas. They wake up to find themselves trapped in an abandoned hospital with the other bus passengers. Their only chance of getting out alive is by solving the mysterious Game Master`s puzzles!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Game no Kan Satsujin Jiken File. 1
L`affaire des meurtres dans la demeure du jeu - Dossier 1
The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 1
ゲームの館殺人事件 File.1

REGULAR.description:
The Game Master`s deadly game continues, pitting Hajime and company against one lethal trap after another. In fact, it seems like the murderous mastermind wants to do away with all of the members. Will Hajime make it out of the Game Mansion alive, let alone unmask the Game Master?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Game no Kan Satsujin Jiken File. 2
L`affaire des meurtres dans la demeure du jeu - Dossier 2
The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 2
ゲームの館殺人事件 File.2

REGULAR.description:
Kindaichi unmasks the Game Master, reveals their murderous motive, and shows how their tricks were done. But will the game of death claim one more victim?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Game no Kan Satsujin Jiken File. 3
L`affaire des meurtres dans la demeure du jeu - Dossier 3
The Game Mansion Murder Case, File 3
ゲームの館殺人事件 File.3
Opening 1
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 金田一少年の事件簿_(アニメ)

titles.title: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo Returns
Los casos de Kindaichi regresan
The Case File of Young Kindaichi Returns
The File of Young Kindaichi Returns
金田一少年の事件簿R[リターンズ]
金田一少年事件簿R
Kindaichi R
Kindaichi S2
Kindaichi Case Files R
